description: THIS IS THE ONE! 3-bed 2.5-bath 1494 SF Scandinavian-inspired townhome in Aalto by Intracorp. RARE FOUND Cul-de-sec quiet newer TH complex that is walking distance to Coquitlam Centre! PRIVATE 145sf PATIO plus a south facing balcony filled with natural light! Beautiful oak-themed laminate flooring upgrade, modern kitchen w/ OVERSIZED island & FULL SIZE appliances, stone counters, & a statement dining area with built in millwork! A XL laundry room for growing families. Lovingly maintained w/ thoughtful additions: floating shelves & dining room millwork, Mysa smart thermostats. 2-car garage & a driveway. Stunning clubhouse w/ a gym, fire-pit area / lounge, children's outdoor playground. WALK to Skytrain & Coquitlam Centre and great school catchments!
